column4: Hi guys, ANy idea where I can get the list of jaunty repos to install opera, acroread, and also the ATI drivers?
happyhessian::: there is am option to mplayer which allows you to specify the alsa HW device number...
happyhessian::: I thibk you can also fiddel about with the ALSA conf settings to specify the default device...
thanks, i'll look for it...though that it would seem that there should be some way to globally tell it to use the right soundcard, rather than having to fix it for every app
